dmca.title: [ABUSE] Use of Nintendo Mark]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 09, 2006 9:28 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Use of Nintendo Mark]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Use of Nintendo Mark]


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Tue May 09 06:33:36 2006
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001
X-Mozilla-Status2:         00000000
Received:         from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52]) by
mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim) id 1FdKgQ-0005RB-GF; Tue, 09 May 2006 00:22:54 -0500
Received:         from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
stopinfringement@cyveillance.com) with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FdKgO-0005QY-7b for
abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 09 May 2006 00:22:52 -0500
Received:         from mail1.cyveillance.com ([63.100.163.123]) by
mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
stopinfringement@cyveillance.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1FdKgI-000C6a-OV
for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 09 May 2006 00:22:49 -0500
Received:         from prodap2.corp.cyveillance.com (unknown
[10.16.1.142]) by
mail1.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 9B29878003; Tue, 9 May
2006 01:27:06 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID:
<511301.601147152165931.JavaMail.cicusr@prodap2.corp.cyveillance.com>
Date:         Tue, 9 May 2006 01:22:45 -0400 (EDT)
From:         stopinfringement@cyveillance.com
To:         abuse@theplanet.com
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         text/html; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding:         quoted-printable
Received-SPF:         none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 63.100.163.123 is
neither permitted nor denied by domain of cyveillance.com)
client-ip=63.100.163.123;
envelope-from=stopinfringement@cyveillance.com;
helo=mail1.cyveillance.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -100.2
Subject:         [ABUSE] Use of Nintendo Mark
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:
<http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:
<http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



05/09/2006


Abuse



*Re: http://www.surfarcade.com/games/Franks-Adventure-2*
**
*IDENTIFIED PROBLEM: Web site uses a Nintendo trademark (Kirby) in *
*the c**ode of **the page.*


Dear Abuse,


We are an Internet monitoring agency representing Nintendo of America
Inc. ("Nintendo"). We are writing to ask you to stop using the Nintendo
properties in the hidden text/visible text/meta tags and/or title and/or
links of the above-referenced sexually explicit Web site. Nintendo's
customers include many children and their parents. Unauthorized use of
Nintendo trademark(s)/work(s) is harmful to those customers and will
tarnish Nintendo's reputation.


We look forward to your immediate confirmation that you have taken the
necessary steps to resolve this matter. To that end, you may email us at
StopInfringement@cyveillance.com
<mailto:StopInfringement@cyveillance.com>.


Please note that these are automatic email boxes so typically no
response is sent as long as the problem is corrected.


Sincerely,
Cyveillance

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEYKb3vK/XpJs6oyURAr/WAKCVeDqyrcb8lMtBZ7KJiGUp0dYJeACfRtu/
17nA9v7a4BCI2zU7XBC+KI4=
=lCv1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
